meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elisabeth Karlin Tom Toal Sally O'Rourke Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6063.

td.p: Elisabeth Karlin, a playwright from New York, New York
Tom Toal, an orthopedic surgeon from Lake Oswego, Oregon
Sally O'Rourke, a freelance copywriter originally from Baton Rouge, Louisiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $33,601)

tr.td: WATCHMAKER, WATCHMAKER
A HOST OF TV HOSTS
BODY LANGUAGE
WE WHISTLE WHILE YOU WORK
HALL-ELUJAH!
IT'S REIGNING MEN

Tom
Elisabeth

STATE SANDWICH

WORDS BEFORE BALL

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: No. If you\'re talking about "tubes, transistors, wires & tapes" you\'re talking about hardware, and he said [*] is just as important.)
ElisabethWhat wire fidelity wi-fi
$0
TomWhat is ?
$7,400
SallyWhat is the motherboard?
$13,601
software')

Sally
Tom

Sally
Tom
Elisabeth

(including 1 DD),
